```{r}
a<-2
b<-5
r1<-sum(a,b)
r2<-a-b
r3<-prod(a,b)
r4<-a/b
r5<-a**b
v1<-c(r1,r2,r3,r4,r5)
print(v1)
v2<-c("sum","diff","prod","ratio","power")
print(v2)
df<-data.frame(v1,v2)
colnames(df)<-c("Results","Operations")
show(df)
df[3,1]

```
